text: Audrina Patridge and singer Ryan Cabrera split back in May 2010. But on Saturday, the couple fueled dating rumors when they were spotted attending Stagecoach in Palm Springs together. The 32 - year - old actress was definitely in the honky - tonk spirit as she posed denim clad in front of an old Chevy pickup truck.
